title: Episode 12 - How to Pick Stocks in this Difficult Market
itunes:title: How to Pick Stocks in this Difficult Market
description:
Andrew
Horowitz from the Disciplined Investor Podcast breaks down the markets and
economic data. Also, he shares his favorite long and short ideas. Then, editor
of the Insider Strategist newsletter Braden Copeland tells us why you need to
be weary of.
